cards.title: Gray
setup: At the start of the game, {Gray} enters play, 'Walking Nuclear Reactor' side up.
Search the villain deck for 1 copy of Chain Reaction and put it into play. Shuffle the villain deck.
gameplay: At the end of the villain turn, if there are 3 or more radiation cards in play, flip {Gray}'s villain character cardh and destroy 1 environment card.
At the end of the villain turn, {Gray} deals the hero target with the highest HP {H - 1} energy damage.
Whenever a radiation card is destroyed, destroy 1 hero ongoing or equipment card and {Gray} deals each non-villain target {H - 1} energy damage.
cards.advanced: Whenever a radiation card is destroyed, destroy a second hero ongoing or equipment card.
flippedGameplay: At the start of the villain turn, if there are 1 or 0 radiation cards in play, {Gray} flips.
At the start of the villain turn, destroy all but 2 hero ongoing or equipment cards. {Gray} deals each hero target {H * 2} energy damage. Play the top card of the villain deck.
Whenever a radiation card is destroyed by a hero card, {Gray} deals that hero {H - 1} energy damage.
Whenever a copy of Radioactive Cascade is destroyed, {Gray} deals the hero with the highest HP {H - 1} energy damage.
cards.flippedAdvanced: Reduce damage dealt to villain targets by 1.
cards.challengeText: At the start of the villain turn, {Gray} deals each target 1 irreducible energy damage.

openingLines.default: I'm already fixing the problem. If you don't like what it takes, that just makes you another problem.
openingLines.VanishCharacter: You! [b]You[/b] did this to me. Let's see how you like having [b]your[/b] life torn apart!
openingLines.FirstResponseVanishCharacter: Your company was just a warmup. Your new team is next. No matter how far you run, I'll rip down everything you build.
openingLines.PastVanishCharacter: You can't fool me by changing your outfit. I'm going to destroy you for your part in all this.
openingLines.TombOfThievesVanishCharacter: Reduced to thieving? You're no better than me.
openingLines.PyreCharacter: That glow… How did you meet the same fate as I? Show yourself!
openingLines.UnstablePyreCharacter: I don't understand. Is this a trick?
openingLines.WastelandRoninPyreCharacter: So…in the future, I am relegated to living in a shell and depending on these wretches for help?
openingLines.ExpeditionOblaskPyreCharacter: My company could profit greatly from the technology you have there. Hand it over, or I'll peel it off your corpse.

cards.title: Alistair Winters
body: Increase damage dealt to hero targets by 1.
Hero targets cannot gain HP.

flavorQuotes.text: You're pretty strong, for some clown who thinks she's The Wraith!

cards.title: Blight the Land
cards.body: At the end of the villain turn, this card deals each non-villain target 2 toxic damage and each Radiation card regains 2 HP.

flavorQuotes.text: The world dies at my feet.{BR}Lady, where would you have me go?

cards.title: Chain Reaction
body: At the start of the villain turn, this card deals the X hero targets with the lowest HP 1 energy damage each, where X is the number of Radiation cards in play.
At the end of the villain turn, put a random Radiation card from the villain trash into play.

flavorQuotes.text: Och aye, there’s just the{BR}one. How bad kin it be?

cards.title: Contamination
body: Whenever a hero deals damage to a villain target, that hero must destroy 1 of their ongoing or equipment cards.
Destroy this card when {H} hero cards are destroyed this way in one round.

flavorQuotes.text: What do you mean,{BR}'That's not the bad news'?

cards.title: Critical Mass
body: Search the villain deck and trash for all copies of Chain Reaction and put them into play. Move 1 copy of Unstable Isotope from the villain trash to the villain deck. Shuffle the villain deck.
{Gray} deals himself 2 energy damage.

flavorQuotes.text: I've lost everything.{BR}Care to see how that feels?

cards.title: Heavy Radiation
body: Reduce damage dealt to {Gray} by 1 for each Radiation card in play.
At the end of the villain turn, if there are no Radiation cards in play, play the top card of the villain deck.

flavorQuotes.text: Attention: he is not a{BR}ghost either. Be alarmed.

cards.title: Irradiated Touch
body: At the end of the villain turn, {Gray} deals the hero target with the second highest HP {H - 2} melee and {H - 2} energy damage.
When this card is destroyed, {Gray} deals the hero target with the highest HP 2 energy damage.

cards.title: Living Reactor
cards.body: Whenever {Gray} deals damage to a hero target, either increase that damage by 1 or that player must discard a card.

flavorQuotes.text: This is what I am now.{BR}Better make the most of it!

cards.title: Mutated Wildlife
body: Increase damage dealt by environment cards by 1. Whenever a villain target would be dealt damage by an environment card, redirect that damage to the hero target with the highest HP.
At the end of the villain turn, play the top card of the environment deck.

flavorQuotes.text: And I thought Pike's{BR}rat problem was bad.

cards.title: Nuclear Fire
body: {Gray} deals the 2 hero targets with the highest HP {H - 1} energy damage each.
{Gray} deals the 2 hero targets with the lowest HP {H - 2} fire damage each.

cards.title: Radioactive Cascade
body: When this card enters play, {Gray} deals the hero with the highest HP X energy damage, where X is 2 plus the number of Radiation cards in play.
When another villain card is destroyed, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: Really, messing with me{BR}is bad for your health.

cards.title: Unstable Isotope
cards.body: Reveal cards from the top of the villain deck until 2 Radiation cards are revealed. Put those cards into play and discard the rest.

flavorQuotes.text: You're not emitting lethal{BR}doses yet. But we still don't know what{BR}the accident changed.

cards.title: Unwitting Henchmen
body: At the end of the villain turn, destroy 1 equipment card.
If a card is destroyed this way, {Gray} regains 3 HP. Otherwise this card deals the hero target with the highest HP 1 melee damage.

flavorQuotes.text: If we're going to stabilize your{BR}condition, these are the components{BR}they'll need to procure.
